Test Case Description: Verify the username field accepts valid input.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Enter a valid username.
Expected Result: Username is accepted and moves to the next field.

Test Case Description: Verify the password field masks the entered password.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Enter any password and ensure it is masked.
Expected Result: Password is masked and not visible.

Test Case Description: Verify the login button is functional and submits credentials.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Enter valid credentials.
3. Click the login button.
Expected Result: Login button is functional and submits credentials for authentication.

Test Case Description: Verify the forgot password link redirects to the reset password page.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Click on the "Forgot Password" link.
Expected Result: "Forgot Password" link redirects to the password reset page.

Test Case Description: Verify login with valid username and password.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Enter a valid username and password.
3. Click the login button.
Expected Result: User is logged in successfully and redirected to the CRM system.

Test Case Description: Verify login with an invalid username.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Enter an invalid username and valid password.
3. Click the login button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for invalid username.

Test Case Description: Verify login with an invalid password.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Enter a valid username and invalid password.
3. Click the login button.
Expected Result: An error message is displayed for invalid password.

Test Case Title / Name: Verify Error Message for Empty Fields
Test Case Description: Verify error messages appear when the username and password fields are left empty.
Pre-Conditions: User is on the login page.
Test Steps:
1. Open the Login page.
2. Leave the username and password fields empty.
3. Click the login button.
Expected Result: Error messages are displayed for empty username and password fields.
